messages.title: New Look and Feel
messages.message: Notice something different? We’ve modernized our look and started making updates that make it easier for you to achieve your learning goals.

messages.title: All Course Dates at a Glance
messages.message: See all the important dates of your course at a glance in the dates tab. You'll never miss another deadline!

messages.title: Personalized Learning Schedules
messages.message: When you are enrolled in a self-paced course, you can now see your personalized learning schedule with due dates on your phone. You can also shift due dates if you need to adjust your schedule - your course, your way!

messages.title: Improved Discovery Experience
messages.message: We've improved the way you search and enroll in your favorite courses & programs.

messages.title: More playback speed options
messages.message: We’ve added more options for controlling video speed to meet your needs.

messages.title: Rewind and forward videos
messages.message: We’ve heard you! Now you can rewind or forward videos to get to the exact point where it matters.

messages.title: Chromecast Support
messages.message: Want to watch course videos on a larger screen? We added Chromecast support and now you can!

messages.title: YouTube Player
messages.message: Tired of leaving the app to watch YouTube course videos? Now you can view videos with an in-app player.

messages.title: Microsoft Login
messages.message: You can now register or login with a Microsoft account.

messages.title: Expanded Language Support
messages.message: You can now view the edX app in German, French, Portuguese, Chinese, and Turkish. The application uses your device language to specify this setting.

messages.title: Video Play Speed
messages.message: Watch and learn at your own pace by adjusting the video play speed controls.

messages.title: SD Card Option
messages.message: You can now choose to store downloaded videos in your SD card from the settings area.

messages.title: Program & Degree Discovery
messages.message: You can now search edX programs and degrees using the mobile application!

messages.title: Programs on Mobile
messages.message: You can now view your edX programs on the go!

messages.title: Improved Landscape and Rotation Support
messages.message: You can now rotate your Android device for improved viewing on most areas of the application.

messages.title: Show Popular Subjects in Course Discovery
messages.message: Browse courses by subject when you are looking for new learning experiences!

messages.title: Bulk Download Subsection Videos
messages.message: Easily download all videos within a subsection using the new toggle controls.

messages.title: Improved Video Streaming Quality
messages.message: Video streaming quality will now adapt based on your network. Improve video quality even further by connecting to a WiFi network!

messages.title: Improved Navigation
messages.message: Quickly access your courses or discover new courses using the new application navigation.

messages.title: Bulk Video Download
messages.message: Easily download all videos within a course using the new toggle control.

messages.title: Improved Course Navigation
messages.message: Quickly jump to course videos, discussions, and important dates in your course using new in-course navigation.

messages.title: Updated Navigation
messages.message: A simplified main menu makes it easier to access and discover courses.

messages.title: Assignment Due Dates
messages.message: You can now see due dates for assignments in the course outline.

messages.title: Videos
messages.message: The "Videos" tab in each course's menu replaces "My Videos" in the main menu. Now you can view all the videos in a course in one place!

messages.title: Delete Videos
messages.message: In the list of downloaded course videos, use a long press to select videos that you want to delete.

messages.title: Delete Videos
messages.message: Swipe left to delete downloaded videos.
